databaseConfig.sql:
SELECT MS_SI_PRESENTATION_ITEM_ID , SET_NO , SN , NAME ,
DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS
FROM MS_SI_PRESENTATION_ITEM
WHERE DELETE_FLAG = 0

UPDATE MS_SI_PRESENTATION_ITEM SET
SET_NO = :SET_NO ,SN = :SN ,NAME = :NAME
,DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG ,SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG ,VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID ,DATA_NO = :DATA_NO ,USER_KEY = :USER_KEY ,RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE ,RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID ,TS = :TS
WHERE MS_SI_PRESENTATION_ITEM_ID = :MS_SI_PRESENTATION_ITEM_ID AND TS = :TS
